lead_paragraph: ISIK--Mustafa. December 15 1927-April 22 2016. An extraordinary husband, father, grandfather and friend who lived his life with courage, dignity and grace has passed away. 1949 graduate of Istanbul Teknik University and licensed professional engineer in Maryland and New York, his career spanned assignments at NATO, Bechtel and Ebasco. He is survived by his wife Meral, two daughters, son and two grandsons. 1/3
